parameters: I should fill it with some tap water
Ah, I should put the water bucket back
啊，我应该把水桶放回去
The innermost room should be the safest... Those on the outside can be spotted easily...
最里面那个隔间应该比较安全……靠外面的话可能会被发现……
Well actually there’s no difference... But I still feel that the innermost one is the best...
其实没有什么区别……但还是感觉里面那个好……
I should go to that one...
All women’s restrooms are in maintenance at this most crucial moment
在关键时候全部的女生厕所都坏了
而且说到底这也太奇怪了吧？
How can they do it at the same time?
怎么可能同一时间两个女厕都坏了
哎，无论如何，反正解决了
This is the end of the world, isn’t it?
I should close the toilet lid first
In this emergency, I suddenly remembered that I kind of wanted to be an engineer when I was little
在这种紧急的时刻，突然想到自己小时候曾经也理想着成为一名工程师
Wait? Did I have this kind of dream?
等等？真有这样的理想嘛？
Maybe I’m just trying to make something up, as to rationalize the thing that I’m going to do next
可能只是为了合理化我现在正准备在做的这件事情而捏造的理由而已
Everything in this world should follow the rule of causality, this is my OCD
万事万物，都要有因有果，这是我的强迫症
即使是命中注定，也一定必有其因
Let me check what's in the toilet's tank...
This toilet... How long has it not been used?
Honestly, which year was Yume Sakura Highschool built?
说到底梦樱高校到底是哪年开始建立的？
Our school badge only has the number of the last year
我们每个人的校徽都只有去年的年份
For example, the one on my shirt has the number: 2020
But our school can’t have been built in 2020 right?
总不能是去年才建的吧？
I really wish it was built last year, especially in this moment...
这种时候倒是有点希望是去年才建的……
But now the lid of the water tank is open
而且还放了一本绿色外皮的东西
I should put the note book away before checking the sink...
先拿出来看看下面还有没有堵住吧……
Well... There’s no strange smell inside...
The truth is, this tank even looks a bit new...
说实在的，这马桶水箱，看上去比较新……
Although it is a water tank...
根本就看不出有什么水渍
It looks like there has never been water in there!
I do not think this thing can be fixed anymore
应该是没修好的可能了
But speaking of which, why is there a note book?!!
不过为什么这里会有本笔记本啊喂？！！
But well, highschool kids, they are now in the most Chuunibyou period of their lives
说来也是，高中生，正值最中二的年纪
It is not strange for them to do these kinds of things
干出点这种事情也不奇怪
Spending 10 RMB to buy a notebook on the street
买一本在路边10块钱就能买到的笔记本
Giving it a Chuunibyou title, and then hiding it in here
写个中二的标题，藏在这里
And then going back to the class and saying
"Oh Hey, you know what, I heard that there’s a secret notebook in the men’s restroom~"
“哦，哦，你们知不知道男厕所最里面马桶水箱里有一本神秘的笔记本~”
"Those who have seen it will die tonight~"
“只要看过的人都会在今晚死掉~”
Well, let's just have a peek. I'm sure nothing bad will happen
嘛，就看一眼，看一眼又不会怎样
My IQ is on a different level compared to them anyway
反正我和他们的智商是不一样的
Yes, this is called getting to know the thoughts of a Chuunibyou high school student
嗯嗯，我这叫了解中二高中生的想法
Wait, I’m also a high school student
等等，我不就是高中生嘛
恶作剧也太没有诚意了
I don’t know where I should start from...
不知道该从哪里开始吐槽……
I thought I had found treasure
明明是找到了宝藏的心情
But it turned out to be trash
结果打开你却给我看这个
how would I even flush this toilet!
I really want to kill myself at this point
这一刻，我想把我自己一刀捅死
如果现在有一只土拨鼠
that could dig a hole from the Eastern Hemisphere to the Western Hemisphere
能从东半球直线挖到西半球
I would definitely go with him
我想和它一起去的那种
Is there someone else in the toliet
I should check beneath the door...
Seems like no one is here..
I’m smart enough to come up with a brilliant idea
There should be a water bucket right next to the sinks in each restroom
厕所的洗手池的旁边好像都有一个水桶
Well, at least for all women’s restrooms
嘛，至少女生厕所是这样的
As long as I can fill a bucket with some water
Then the problem will be solved!
The water tank seems to be full now...
仿佛是天使降临的感觉
I’m saved by the sound of a flushing toilet...
整个人都被这马桶冲水的声音给治愈了……
Why...Why can't I just pour water into the toilet bowl and flush it?
我为什么不能……直接用把水倒进马桶里冲水？
唉算了……现在还是赶紧溜吧……
Let’s pour the water into the tank
把这些水倒进水箱里吧
Well, seems like I still need more water...
但看起来好像还不够的样子……
I should fill it with some tap water
